887230.name: Fantasy Grounds - En5ider: Its Alive (5E)
887230.description:
En5ider: Its Alive

Does your victim wish to inflict a plague via an obscure ritual at the start of a solar eclipse on the grounds of an accursed cemetary using the blood of an innocent demon? Build rituals to achieve your villain's dark goals. Animate a golem, summon a god, open the Gates of Hell, or banish the sun.
Seven tables describe the ritual's purpose, time, location, components, side-effects, price of failure, and - of course - how to foil the dastardly deed!
By
Mark A. Hart
illustrated by
Jacob Blackmon
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: David Brown
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
